verbose_text: Carboplatin is a platinum based agent which coordinates permanently to DNA XREF_BIBR, paclitaxel acts on cytoskeletal tubulin to induce defects in mitotic spindle assembly XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, etoposide is a topoisomerase II inhibitor which induces DNA strand breakage by preventing re-ligation XREF_BIBR, gemcitabine is a pyrimidine nucleoside analog which interrupts cell division by replacing cytidine during DNA replication XREF_BIBR, and PDT, with the photosensitizer verteporfin, induces apoptosis by localized generation of singlet oxygen to damage anti-apoptotic Bcl family proteins and trigger direct release of cytochrome c XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR.
evidence: induces apoptosis by localized generation of singlet oxygen to damage anti-apoptotic Bcl-family proteins and trigger direct release of cytochrome c
